abstract: Providencia Paredes, special assistant to Jacqueline Kennedy during her time as first lady, dies at age 90.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Paredes helped the first lady with everything from fashion designers to Spanish pronunciation on trips to Latin America.

headline.main: Providencia Paredes, Assistant to Jacqueline Kennedy, Dies at 90
headline.print_headline: Providencia Paredes, 90, Assistant to Mrs. Kennedy in White House

snippet: Ms. Paredes helped the first lady with everything from fashion designers to Spanish pronunciation on trips to Latin America.
